page.title: 19FORTON PUBS cont
page.content: {Foxholes}The Foxholes Hotel is along Hollins Lane. They have a beautiful garden with a swinging chair,gardens, seats and a pond with fish and toads in. It is owned by Birtha and her sister. Two old ladies work there. They have two deer heads on the walls. It is a hotel and has about ten bedrooms. The favourite drink for men is beer and women is lager. The favourite food is chips,peas and steak.They have one pool table. A bar, a dance floor, a cocktail bar, and a,dining room.{BAYHORSE} The Bayhorse Inn is in Bayhorse.
